com.kuka.threading

Class TaskContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuka.threading.TaskContext

  • public final class TaskContext
extends Object
    Provides static functions for querying, checking, and switching the current ITaskContext.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TaskContext.Switch
      Implementation of AutoCloseable that will switch back to a previous task context on TaskContext.Switch.close().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ITaskContext NONE
      The default context which equates "no task context".

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ITaskContext get() 
      static ITaskContext require() 
      static TaskContext.Switch switchTo(ITaskContext taskContext)
      Switches to another task context and returns an AutoCloseable so it is usable in a try-with-resources statement.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • NONE

        public static final ITaskContext NONE
        The default context which equates "no task context".

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static ITaskContext get()
        Returns:
        the current ITaskContext or NONE, if the current thread is not in a task context. Never null.

      • require

        public static ITaskContext require()
        Returns:
        The current ITaskContext, never null and never NONE.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current thread is not in a task context.

      • switchTo

        public static TaskContext.Switch switchTo(ITaskContext taskContext)
        Switches to another task context and returns an AutoCloseable so it is usable in a try-with-resources statement.
        Parameters:
        taskContext - the task context to switch to.
        Returns:
        a new task context TaskContext.Switch.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the argument is null.
